Posted By: Dave Hornish
Looking to buy one of the following T206 Cards in PSA 1 or 2/SGC 10, 20, 30:

Matty Portrait
Young Glove
Young Bare Hand
Johnson Pitching

Paper Loss on back is no problem, looking for a card that presents decently for the grade.  Scans appreciated if you have one available.
